price: সিহঁততকৈ উৎকৃষ্টসকলক সিহঁতৰ স্থলৱৰ্তী কৰিবলৈ, আৰু এনে কৰাত আমি অক্ষম নহয়।
arabic: عَلَىٰٓ أَن نُّبَدِّلَ خَيۡرٗا مِّنۡهُمۡ وَمَا نَحۡنُ بِمَسۡبُوقِينَ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: ʿalā an nubaddila khayran min'hum wamā naḥnu bimasbūqīna
